title: Workshop on Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: Interprofessional Clinical Reasoning Collaboration for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain collaborative diagnostic reasoning methods through clinical case discussions with other healthcare professionals within four weeks.
Learners can present two or more strategies to resolve conflicts arising during the development of discipline-specific treatment plans in week 8.
Learners can present a patient management protocol co-developed with other professionals in a project format at the end of the six-month course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
